titleStmt.title: Certaine miscellany vvorks of the Right Honourable Francis Lo. Verulam, Viscount S. Alban. Published by William Rawley ...
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
Rawley, William, 1588?-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Hauiland for Humphrey Robinson, dwelling at the signe of the three Pigeons in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "Considerations touching a vvarre with Spaine", "An advertisement touching an holy vvarre", "An offer to our late soveraigne King Iames, of a digest to be made of the lawes of England", and "The history of the reigne of King Henry the Eighth" each has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the three Pigeons in Pauls Church-yard
